snippet.title: Chinatown Detective Agency: Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1172190/Chinatown_Detective_Agency/
Free prologue: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401920/Chinatown_Detective_Agency_Day_One/

Chinatown Detective Agency is a mystery adventure game that will have you traveling across Singapore and the world in the year 2032. Research your way through mysteries, clues and leads as you pursue suspects and objects of value whiel managing your detective agency.

Inspired by the classic Carmen Sandiego series of games, as well as Blade Runner, The Da Vinci Code and noir detective movies, Chinatown Detective Agency will pull you into a world of dark intrigue.

Planned release date: Summer 2021.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/genintco
Discord: https://discord.gg/DEmsAwn
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/genintco/
